import useInput from "../hooks/use-input" const DiaryInput = () => { const checkNull = val => val.trim() !== "" const { value: titleValue, hasError: titleError, inputValueChangeHandler: titleChangeHandler, inputValueBlurHandler: titleBlurHandler, resetHandler: titleReset } = useInput(checkNull) const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); } return (
) } export default DiaryInput
